Setting.Name: TicketCIDetails::CIValuesByClass
Setting.Description: Defines the CI values that need to be pull into dynamic field. Each entry must be prefixed with the class name and double colons (i.e. Computer::). There are a few CI-Attributes that common to all CIs (example for the class Computer: Computer::Name, Computer::CurDeplState, Computer::CreateTime). To show individual CI-Attributes as defined in the CI-Definition, the following scheme must be used (example for the class Computer): Computer::HardDisk::1, Computer::HardDisk::2. Only 1st , 2nd and 3rd level definition supported at the moment. READ INFO OR README FILE
